text: Came in at 1:34p on a Saturday no other customers in the store, I was able to put in my order immediately. The girl told me it would "be like 10 minutes"; waited 29 minutes. There was no pizza hot-n-ready. ‚Ä¶More

text: Had this been 3 years ago I would have rated 5 stars but the service and quality have plummeted within the 9 years I've been in Jasper, unfortunately.

name: Jordan Chapman
text: So the only person who actually does their job here is the manager. The night staff of teenage girls are pathetic had this poor woman running the whole store alone. Even after she asked them to do their jobs.  Everyone should be fired and replaced. I feel truly sorry for the manager of this place.
